welcome_message_body: Welcome to Oberhausen, where the unique blend of industrial history and modern attractions awaits you. Enjoy our famous Gasometer, shopping at CentrO, and the charming Altstadt. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring our city!

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Düsseldorf International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at Düsseldorf International Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a 24-hour time limit per device.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
